item.title: Weekends
item.description: One of the biggest changes in going from “single guy” to “family man” is that the weekend, once the thing that got one through a tough week, is now..something else entirely. It’s not ‘my’ time anymore, it belongs to my wife and children as well. It was a harsh adjustment at first, of course (especially when the first child arrive and everything changed, but now that I’ve set my expectations for what a weekend entails accordingly, I can handle it.

item.title: A Beginning
item.description: For when Twitter isn’t enough to contain my rants..now there’s this site. Also announcements about any songs I’ve posted to YouTube..(no ETA on any of those just yet.) Along with anything else I might think of..
